author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2603: camel-cache now supports GET operation. Refactored code to properly shutdown cache manager. Applied patch with thanks to Volodymyr Buell.

author: hansbak
msg: allow an optional 'reason' parameter when the status is changed of a customer request

author: jonesde
msg: Refactored the various link getParameterList methods to return a Map and expand with the context like most of the other get methods that are used during rendering; that is the biggest change but was part of adding a parameters-map attribute to the form widget hyperlink element to be able to use a script to prepare part or all of the parameters map used in the hidden form instead of having to manually declare all parameters
